title: Internship at the Canadian Space Agency (CSA)
description: I got the amazing opportunity to join the Canadian Space Agency in January of 2022. I held multiple internship positions throughout my 12 months at the Agency which included project management positions for three different space projects as well as a mechanical engineering position. Projects that I have worked on at the Agency include two projects from NASA's Lunar Gateway Program, one of which was the Canadarm3, Canada's largest space project to date. I also contributed to a Lunar Rover Project, which was a part of NASA's Commercial Lunar Payload Services (CLPS) initiative.

title: Aerospace Engineering at Toronto Metropolitan University (Formerly Ryerson University)
Vice President of Education at Aerospace Course Union (Toronto Metropolitan University)
description: During the academic year of 2020-2021, I was a part of the Aerospace Course Union at TMU. This is a student group devoted to serving the Aerospace Engineering students of the university. As a group, ACU hosts various social and academic events throughout the year and promotes Aerospace Engineering at Ryerson. I joined in as the Vice President of Education for the year. In this position, I was responsible for hosting academic events throughout the year. This included various workshops, tutorials, exam-preps, and other related events. Along with this, I was actively interacting with students in the program to help them with their concerns, mainly in terms of academics.
